content:
Tonight, Russian troops attacked the city of Sumy by Shaahd.

About thisreportedSumy Ova.

“Unfortunately, there are three arrivals in different parts of the city. All emergency services work on the ground, ”the message reads.

It is noted that the necessary medical care is provided to the victim. The consequences of aviation strikes are specified.

According to the General Staff of the Armed Forces, at night Russian invaders attacked Ukraine again by applying UAVs like Shahd. According to preliminary information, 38 of these drones were destroyed by defense forces.

Information on the victims and damage to the infrastructure objects is specified.
title: Sumy has a hit as a result of a shotgun of "Shahanedov"
